message: Let's start with this. A fair split considers the impact of inflation on our shares over time.
Your initial offer undervalues my position given the faster rate of inflation applied to your share.  I propose a more equitable split, recognizing the time value of money for both of us.
Bob, I understand your point about the time value of money.  This offer takes that into account while still acknowledging the faster rate of inflation applied to my potential gains.
